features: SheaMoisture African Black Soap Balancing Moisturizer is a face lotion, dry skin moisturizer and cream that keeps skin hydrated while balancing oily to combination skin
This lightweight lotion for dry skin is a paraben free travel size lotion that combines ethically sourced Shea Butter with moisture-rich oils to use as a moisturizing cream or hand lotion
Blended with Black soap and fair trade Shea Butter, this moisturizing lotion and hand lotion creates a rich dry skin lotion and moisturizer
Meet SheaMoisture's carefully formulated dry skin cream, moisturizing lotion and hand care that contains no parabens, no phthalates and no mineral oil
You can also use this skin moisturizer by SheaMoisture as a hand therapy dry skin moisturizer or moisturizing lotion for dry skin or as a sensitive skin lotion every day
Enjoy our shea butter moisturizing cream and skin moisturizer for dry skin that's a paraben free lotion by SheaMoisture that has been tested on our family for generations and never on animals
body.description: SheaMoisture African Black Soap Balancing Moisturizer is a face lotion, dry skin moisturizer and cream that keeps skin hydrated while balancing oily to combination skin. This lightweight lotion for dry skin is a paraben free travel size lotion by SheaMoisture that combines ethically sourced Shea Butter with moisture-rich oils to use as a moisturizing cream or hand lotion. Blended with Black soap and fair trade Shea Butter, this moisturizing lotion and hand lotion creates a rich dry skin lotion and moisturizer. Meet SheaMoisture's carefully formulated dry skin cream, moisturizing lotion and hand care that contains no parabens, no phthalates and no mineral oil. You can also use this skin moisturizer by SheaMoisture as a hand therapy dry skin moisturizer or moisturizing lotion for dry skin or as a sensitive skin lotion every day. Enjoy our shea butter moisturizing cream and skin moisturizer for dry skin that's a paraben free lotion by SheaMoisture that has been tested on our family for generations and never on animals. Our Story: Sofi Tucker started selling Shea Nuts at the village market in Bonthe, Sierra Leone in 1912. By age 19, the widowed mother of four was selling Shea Butter, African Black Soap and her homemade hair and skin preparations all over the countryside. Sofi Tucker was our Grandmother and SheaMoisture is her legacy. With this purchase you help empower disadvantaged women to realize a brighter, healthier future.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Sheamoisture African Black Soap With Shea Butter and Tamarind extract SheaMoisture African Black Soap is designed for those dealing with acne-prone skin that breaks out into blemishes and those with combination skin. Black soap is the ultimate African moisturizer for keeping the skin nicely hydrated while balancing oily to combination skin.

Balancing Moisturizer Ideal for all skin types and complexions, this traditional black skin moisturizer is made using our exclusive skin-balancing black soap blend, which includes creamy certified organic Shea Butter, Cocoa Pod Ash and blemish-fighting Tamarind Oil Extract and Tea Tree Oil. This ultra-rich formula also includes Jojoba and Avocado oils for added luxurious hydration. A little bit of this balancing moisturizer goes a long way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effective and Nourishing
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the SheaMoisture Balancing Moisturizer for Dry Skin African Black Soap with Shea Butter, and I must say that I'm quite pleased with my purchase. I've been a fan of SheaMoisture products for a while now because of their consistent quality, and this moisturizer did not disappoint.First of all, the 2 oz size is perfect for me as it's easy to carry around and great for on-the-go use. I have dry skin, and I'm always on the lookout for moisturizers that provide effective hydration without leaving my skin feeling greasy. This product struck the perfect balance.What I love about this moisturizer is its use of African Black Soap and Shea Butter. These natural ingredients are known for their nourishing and skin-balancing properties. After using it for a while, I've noticed a significant improvement in the overall texture and hydration of my skin. It has helped soothe dry patches and leaves my skin feeling soft and smooth.Another thing worth mentioning is the pleasant scent of this product. It's not overpowering but has a subtle, pleasant fragrance that makes the application even more enjoyable.Overall, I highly recommend the SheaMoisture Balancing Moisturizer for Dry Skin African Black Soap with Shea Butter. If you're looking for a quality moisturizer that's suitable for dry skin and packed with natural ingredients, this is definitely worth a try. It's become a staple in my skincare routine, and I couldn't be happier with the results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Dries up oily parts moisturizes dry parts. Dries up blemishes and blackheads. I've replaced five pricey products with just this one. I can't imagine a skin type this wouldn't work for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This moisturizer works really well! I have sensitive skin and always struggled to find a moisturizer that wasn't too heavy or greasy, and wouldn't make me break out. Then I found this one, and it's amazing! I use it morning and night, and once it's absorbed it works very nicely under makeup as well. Would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a great moisturizer at a good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Haven’t really formed an opinion.
reviews.reviewText: I can’t say if I like or dislike just starting using product. But I do like that it’s not greasy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s part of my routine now
reviews.reviewText: This is my new favorite. I love how it makes my skin look. I’ll definitely be using these from now on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars so I needed a great moisturizer and this was it
reviews.reviewText: This is a combo review for the moisturizer and the Shea Moisture black soap. I am in my 40s and have suffered with adult acne for YEARS. I have tried EVERYTHING over the years, including prescription antibiotic gel, Proactiv, BC pills, and just about every other product, and nothing has ever worked. Nothing. I believe my breakouts are mostly caused by hormones, so I was just about to give up and accept my skin. I have combination skin, but it's very sensitive. Even supposedly hypoallergenic products didn't help.Well, after only a few days of using this moisturizer in conjunction with their black soap and toner, my face is completely bump free!! I bought the soap first, and I had a moderate breakout the very first day and figured it was another dud. Boy was I wrong! The soap is drying, so I needed a great moisturizer and this was it! After using this moisturizer and the soap, I am clearing up very nicely and maybe now some of these old acne scars can finally heal. It's not greasy feeling on your skin like most moisturizers, and it absorbs very quickly so I wasn't sure it was going to keep my skin hydrated, but so far it's great. My skin is soft and shine free, and makeup goes on great after using it. I love this line!!

Sent bon, est épaisse mais ne rend pas la peau grasse, très bien absorbée par la peau, la rend douce et unifie le teint quand on l'utilise tous les jours, un produit hydratant nourrissant avec de très bons ingrédients! Dommage qu'il est si difficile à trouver !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 29, 2020
reviews.reviewText: My order has just arrived with short delay but perfectly, so ignore my previous review. Thank you
Smooth texture, very moisturising, non greasy, easy to apply, pleasant scent. Would buy again.
